Johann Caspar Lavater's Correspondence

Turtle RDF/XML N-Triples JSON-LD GitHub
owl:Ontology
dct:contributor
Reto Baumgartner, tool coordinator and software developer, University of Zürich, Switzerland
dct:creator
Hans Cools, MD, knowledge engineer, ontologist, software developer, University of Basel, Switzerland
dct:description
Formal description of specific concepts in the critical edition of correspondence of Johann Caspar Lavater, 15 November 1741 - 2 January 1801.
dct:license
http://creativecommons.org/ licenses/ by/ 3.0/
dct:publisher
Universities of Basel, Bern, and Zürich, Switzerland
dct:title
An ontology about Johann Caspar Lavater's correspondence
owl:versionInfo
2020-06-11

Classes

lavater:EditedLetter
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Letter expression either authored or received by Johann Caspar Lavater, and critically edited.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
lavater:
rdfs:label
edited Johann Caspar Lavater letter expression (en)
edierter Brief-Expression Johann Caspar Lavaters (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
scholarly-editing:CriticalEdition
lavater:Letter
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Letter send by or to Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
lavater:
rdfs:label
Johann Caspar Lavater letter (en)
lettera di Johann Caspar Lavater (it)
Johann Caspar Lavater-Brief (de)
lettre de Johann Caspar Lavater (fr)
rdfs:subClassOf
information-carrier:ConvoluteElement
information-carrier:ArchiveElement
letter-corresponding:Letter
lavater:LetterConvolute
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Convolute of letters send by and to Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
lavater:
rdfs:label
Johann Caspar Lavater letter convolute (en)
Briefekonvolut Johann Caspar Lavaters (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
information-carrier:ArchiveElement
information-carrier:Convolute
lavater:LetterExpression
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Letter expression either authored by or written to by Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy
lavater:
rdfs:label
Johann Caspar Lavater letter expression (en)
Brief-Expression Johann Caspar Lavaters (de)
rdfs:subClassOf
letter-corresponding:Expression
text:HandwrittenText
lavater:Page
a
rdfs:Class
rdfs:comment
Page of a letter of Johann Caspar Lavater.
rdfs:isDefinedBy

rdfs:label
